pkgmetadata.longdescription: ===============================Automation Mojo Interop Package===============================This *Automation Mojo Interop Package* contains interop extensions that add interop functionality tothe test environment *Landscape* object for a variety of platform clients, clusters, and protocols.==========References==========- `User Guide <userguide/userguide.rst>`- `Coding Standards <userguide/10-00-coding-standards.rst>`
